document_data.name: House of Galbi
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Galbi''' was a notorious establishment found in the city of [[Manass]] in [[Khazari]].
document_data.Activities: Many illicit activities such as gambling and excessive drinking occurred within the House of Galbi. Rumors surfaced that more heinous tastes could be catered to here as well, but the governor of Manass was not able gather enough proof to close the building down.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Galbi]], a native of [[Semphar]], owned the establishment. He was rumored to run a den of skilled thieves from his House as well.
